description: This group mounts unique, visually fantastic "black light" shows. Famous People Players is renowned not just for the quality of its shows, but also for bringing out the creative potential in performers with disabilities. The price of the show includes a four-course dinner.

reviews.title: Fantabulous ü•∞
text: The whole experience was incredible.  The dinner was delicious,  the show was spectacular and dessert was Devine.
What an inspirational experience and looking forward to returning!
Bravo, bravo, bravo!

reviews.title: Very Inspirational!!!!
text: Wonderful dinner and a great show. Truly a great organization and a wonderful group who provide growth and opportunity for many talented young people.

reviews.title: Congratulations FPP!: 50 years of unmatched, extraordinary theatre
text: Our family had the time of our lives celebrating 50 years of the Famous People Players last night. This was unforgettable, exquisite, impactful dinner theatre at its finest and most creative. The brilliance of founding director, Diane Dupuy, and current director, Joanne Dupuy, shines through as the Famous People Players cook, serve and perform their hearts out, manuvering giant, colorful blacklit puppets to musical numbers like Send in the Clowns, Candy Man, Jailhouse Rock and other numbers by new Canadian musicians that soothe the soul and provide inspiration for the ages. Love abounds in this unprecedented, magnificent performing arts experience. Go FPP; we love you! A shout out to all Toronto businesses, foundations and individuals who have made the Famous People Players possible and given the world the gift of their presence for 50 years and counting!

reviews.title: Amazing show!
text: We came into Toronto and attended Famous People Players with volunteers for Volunteer Appreciation Week on April 20th. It was absolutely amazing! If you haven't seen a show yet, your missing out. Definitely, go out and support this wonderful non profit organziation.

reviews.title: A fun and enjoyable dinner and show for all ages
text: We had such a great time last night at the Famous People Players.  Went with about 50 friends. The food was great, Service was wonderful and the show was really fun. Appropriate for kids and adults alike. It is always such a moving experience when we visit. If you have never been you HAVE to experience FPP. Congratulations on 50 years!! Wow what a record.

reviews.title: Came with the Corvette Club of Ontario and we all had a great time. The perfect place for a club function.
text: We had a delious dinner, there was a wonderful show and the people are just amazing.
This is a magical evening and so glad we came.

reviews.title: Want to feel good about life again?
text: These years of COVID have left me struggling to enjoy life to its fullest again. But; last night I went to Famous People Players and shortly after the show began I was smiling and then the joy of life returned to my soul and my faith in mankind was restored. All of this plus a delicious salmon dinner and dessert.
There is nothing else like Famous People Players in Canada or anywhere else in the world. They are a recognized national treasure.and fifty years later are still going strong.
If you live in Toronto or you're coming this way; treat yourself to an evening that will leave you smiling and feeling good about life and how often does that happen?
Dini Petty

reviews.title: A magical night!!
text: What a great night out from beginning to end! The dining room at the Dine and Dream Theatre feels magical from the moment you walk in and the staff are totally friendly and helpful. The food was fresh and delicious. As we walked along into the theatre it was great to be able to see the giant pictures about the history of Famous People Players with celebrities like Tom Cruise and Paul Newman.

And then the show..wow! You've really never seen anything like it. With the magic of black light the performers create incredible sights, creatures and people on the stage. So much colour, music and movement. Then back to the Dining room for desert and coffee.
I would highly recommend this dinner and show experience to anyone of any age. It's a terrific deal for your money and... an experience you'll never forget.

reviews.title: Awesome experience for people of all ages
text: We were dazzled by the performance. Everyone should see this both  young and old. We saw 'Winter Wonderland' but the theme's change . (check the website) This  theatre  should   be on everyone's list as a 'must see.' The lunch was delicious and the performance amazing. Words cannot explain in full the professionalism of this special company of special needs people.

reviews.title: Great show
text: Took our grandchildren to see the show. Lots of fun and excellent performances from a very talented cast.

reviews.title: A great evening or afternoon experience!
text: A large group of us attended an afternoon performance at the Famous People Players Theatre. We saw "Rock the City with Fun and Laughter". The music was great and the performers did an excellent job with beautifully constructed puppets.  The performance was first class and different from others. It was a black
light theatre presentation. It was a wonderful experience.

Before the performance we enjoyed a delicious salad and chicken with roasted potatoes, carrots and green beans was very tasty and well served.  After the performance we enjoyed our dessert, tea or coffee.
The staff was very friendly and accommodating. The performers were also the servers. The afternoon was very much enjoyed by all who attended. We plan to go back for their Christmas performance!

reviews.title: A must see event!
text: I have wanted to see this production for many years and was excited to have tickets as a Christmas gift.
The warm decor, professionalism and friendliness of the staff and the incredible dinner made this a truly memorable evening.
The theatre product was mesmerizing! If you haven‚Äôt experienced a ‚Äúblack light production‚Äù, you are missing out on a wonderful experience!

The staff/performers are hard working and endearing individuals. We as individuals are all different in our own way. However the Famous People Players shows what hard work, dedication and a sense of ‚Äúfamily‚Äù can do to enrich an individual‚Äôs self esteem and self confidence. Well done to all involved in this production!!

reviews.title: Amazing!
text: Amazing performance with lots of love, inspiration and joy! Our familty had a wonderful evening at this place. The dinner was great, surrounded with very attentive people who served us this evening.
Thank you from the bottom of our hearts!

reviews.title: A GREAT EVENING OUT IN ETOBICOKE
text: wow what wonderful evening!  my family  (three generations) attended the dinner theatre Rock This City tonight to celebrate two birthdays.  The meal was excellent!  and the atmosphere in the dining room was really comfortable. The show was uplifting and we enjoyed ourselves.  Diane and the staff  were super!  can't wait to go again in the summer.

reviews.title: Amazon!
text: Friends of our took my family to this show tonight. We brought our 6 and 8 year old they loved every minute of it. The food and service was awesome and the show was second to none. We were moved by Diane and her story about how FPP came to be and we were more moved by the work of the actors and servers. You MUST go to this, you won‚Äôt regret it.

reviews.title: Exceptional
text: My son treated me for my birthday and the whole family to an awesome afternoon with lunch and show at famous people players l dinner theatre.  The food was very good, the wait staff were extraordinary. The show was so happy and motivated everyone to sing and clap. The whole experience was brilliant. We were also very lucky to have a visit with the founder of the famous people players Diane Dupuis, which totally topped the afternoon. If you or family want to have an amazing experience I would highly recommend you head out to the famous people‚Äôs player‚Äôs dinner theatre.

reviews.title: Go see for yourself, you won‚Äôt be disappointed!
text: Attended Matinee lunch and performance.  The whole experience was very enjoyable.  Food was great and the show ‚ÄúSleigh Bells Ring‚Äù was very entertaining.  Lots of free parking and a very worthwhile cause that is supported through ticket sales.

reviews.title: GREAT SHOW & DINNER
text: Enjoyed a fantastic evening at Famous People Players - not our first visit - but as always everything was GREAT ...
The meal was delicious, the salmon was cooked to perfection as where all the accompanying vegetables.
The meal was served by the performers who where very attentive and nothing was too much trouble.
The show was Fantastic, engaging, funny and absolutely delightful - never a dull moment.
The performers seemed to enjoy it as much as we all did.
Cannot forget dessert, the tiramisu and coffee afterwards was perfect.
A great evening all around.
DEFINITELY A MUST SEE  -     HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

reviews.title: Amazing Night Out
text: What a fabulous night out.  The 3 course dinner (salad to start, full chicken dinner and tiramisu and coffee for dessert) was top notch.
The performance itself was truly outstanding.
Would highly recommend.
Thank you, Famous People Players! You are all amazing!!

reviews.title: Good food great show!
text: We had a great time at the show. We all had a very good meal served by the players themselves. We enjoyed our food, drinks. Oh and i should mention we were a group of over 100 in town for a convention. The show was very entertaining and exceeded my expectations. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Fantastic. Experience
text: Absolutely delightful. Delicious lunch great service and fabulous entertainment! A wonderful experience. Would highly recommend.

reviews.title: An Amazing Experience at Famous PEOPLE Players  Dinner/Theatre
text: I  just had to write a review about Famous PEOPLE Players.  What a fabulous evening my daughter and I had at Famous PEOPLE Players yesterday evening.  I have been at this wonderful dinner/theatre a few times and  have never been disappointed. The food was absolutely delicious and served by the actors of the theatre. Such kind, warm, friendly, and cozy atmosphere.  Following the dinner we are ushered into the black light theatre. The performance we saw was "Rock This City!"  which was fabulous and fun.   I highly recommend Famous PEOPLE Players.  I am looking forward to seeing the next performance, "Going Bananas" in June 2023.

reviews.title: Outstanding Performance and unforgettable experience
text: We took our special needs youth in our church to this show tonight and the whole experience was amazing!!!! Staff and performers are very friendly and professional. They welcome you with a big smile and take you to your table. Dinner is delicious and fancy , service is top. Our group was called into the theatre first and they gave us front row seats.. the show ‚ÄúRock the City‚Äù was outstanding!!! The whole experience was unforgettable. We got to meet the whole crew after the show during dessert and coffee time. The performers are involved in cooking , serving and greeting you. Everyone is so polite and helpful. God bless them. Diane, Joanne, and the amazing performers. Thank you !! You Rock!! Keep doing you. You are so inspirational. A show and production worth watching.

reviews.title: A unique and amazing experience-awesome show, great food, super friendly staff
text: Last week I was treated once more to the unique, creative and wonderful show and dinner experience at Famous Peoples Players. This was my third visit and it never disappoints. The magic created by these talented, friendly and amazing people is so heartwarming. It was the first visit for my three grandchildren, afed 13 to 17, and they had a wonderful time. A special note of thanks to Rachel and all the caring and accommodating staff at the venue. I highly recommend it as a must family entertainment in the city.

reviews.title: Awesome experience at Famous People‚Äôs Players
text: This was an amazing uplifting experience. I would highly recommend attending. The food was awesome, very attentive service. The show was beyond my expectation! Overall a 10 in every aspect.

reviews.title: Awesome Venue--Food, Music, Entertainment, Staff
text: This was a fabulous experience for all ages.   I took our young boys to see Famous People Players at Hamilton Place, in Hamilton, Ontario back about 1985.   They loved it.  The life size characters and amazing music  WOW!!!   I took our small company for our Christmas party for the dinner and show.   The food and service are excellent.   All the staff are so very knowledgeable.  Now we are going back again in April with our families and Granddaughter.

reviews.title: A breathtaking evening
text: It was an absolute privilege getting to experience an evening at famous people players. The decor was amazing, the food was delicious, and the performance was heartwarming and full of life. It was an extremely unique and entertaining black light theatre show. The company is incredibly inspiring to give people with disabilities a place to belong, excel, and be a part of something bigger. I feel proud as a Canadian to have a place like FPP in my city. The players are wonderful and so generous of spirit. I would recommend to anyone visiting Toronto!

reviews.title: A Wonderful Experience
text: Famous People Players is a wonderful place with so many special people. Not only do the players work masterfully in the kitchen but then go on to perform in a show that will leave all audiences smiling. The black light show is unlike any display I have ever seen. Taking a quick peek behind the scenes tells all about how creative and hard-working the players truly are. A fantastic place to visit for any occasion and bring family, friends, or anyone who is looking to enjoy an amazing night in Toronto.

reviews.title: Fantastic
text: The whole evening was a pleasure, right from my 1st phone call with Diane helping me book the tickets, everything went smooth with the whole experience. We went to celebrate a milestone Birthday with some Family, I was abit worried how the teenagers would Enjoy but much to my delight the evening was a Fantastic memory for all of us, food was excellent, show was so entertaining and the desert was awesome staff where Great we will definitely return üòä

reviews.title: Great night out with the family for a 70th bday celebration
text: The dinner was excellent and very tasty followed by an amazing  show.  Great night out for all ages.  The staff went over and beyond - such a happy atmosphere.
Facility was very pleasing and clean

reviews.title: A must see!
text: Not only was the food delicious, but the show, Going Bananas was fun and entertaining. Loved every minute of it. It is a must see!

reviews.title: Tremendous staff  amazing preformances
text: Must see show! Amazing talented group recommend for anyone of any age. Such energy and love for everything they do .

reviews.title: The best school experience ever
text: We are a school from sudbury. Me and a few buddies of kine were spectical about the show. But when it started, we were all amazed by everything going on. The food was absolutely delicious, the chicken, the salad and the desert were absolutely amazing. On behalf of me and my school, this was the best experience we have had in toronto. I strongly recommend this establishment for someone looking for a good meal, and a great experience that you will remember always. Thank you!

reviews.title: ‚ôæÔ∏è/10 go here even if your not planning it
text: It was awesome the people and the service was great the owner even came out to talk to us after the show

reviews.title: A place to visit every time you're in Toronto
text: What a wonderful evening.  The evening began with a delicious dinner served by the best waitstaff anywhere!  After dinner we entered the theater and was treated to a performance by the University of Pittsburgh Treble Ensemble with a beautiful a capella blend.  Following this was the main event - the black box amazing, undescribable show.  The stories of Diane Duprey and the puppeteers were so very beautiful.  If I'm in Toronto, I'm taking my group to Famous People Players.  They never disappoint and every member of my touring group can't wait to go back again.

reviews.title: A local treasure! Dinner theatre like no other!
text: We had a wonderful evening with the Famous People Player Theatre! The value and quality of the dinner was perfectly delicious! The staff was absolutely heartwarming, loving and so hard working. Some of the restaurant staff were part of the incredible cast on stage. You will be entertained and moved to tears. Don't forget to walk through the photo gallery to see how vast the support for Diane has been over the 49 years!  They will inspire you! Call a friend and make it a date. You will love it!

reviews.title: This evening touched our hearts.
text: This evening touched our hearts. The show and food were amazing. But meeting the performers and hearing their story blessed us. AMAZING!

reviews.title: Amazing
text: If you haven‚Äôt been you must go! Food is wonderful the show is wonderful the staff is wonderful the concept is amazing! Inclusion and heartwarming at its best ! Thank you to everyone for the toe tapping show I can‚Äôt wait to return ! You work so hard and it shows !

reviews.title: A DELIGHTFUL AND FUN TIME
text: I WAS MEETING MY SISTER FOR THE VERY FIRST TIME (LONG STORY) AND DECIDED TO TAKE HER TO FAMOUS PEOPLE PLAYERS AS A TREAT.   AS WE ARRIVED I WAS A BIT SURPRIZED ON WHERE IT WAS AND HOW THE OUTSIDE LOOKED BUT ONCE INSIDE, IT WAS PERFECT.
THE SHOW WAS SO PROFESSIONAL,  ENTERTAINING,  AND FUN.  I UNDERSTAND THAT IT IS PUT ON BY CHALLENGED INDIVIDUALS AND CAN ONLY COMMENT ON HOW GOOD IT WAS.

THEN THERE WAS THE DINNER AFTERWORDS.   WE ALL HAD THE CHICKEN AND I CAN NOT SAY ENOUGH ABOUT IT.   IT WAS ABSOLUTELY DELICIOUS!  WE WERE CONSTANTLY TAKEN CARE OF AND ASKED IF WE NEEDED ANY THING ELSE.
I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS FOR AN AFTERNOON OR EVENING EVENT.

reviews.title: kindness and courage through Performance arts.
text: We were in awe of the the entire experience from food to the performance. I teared up in the end. Very inspirational! Every student should have an opportunity to see the wonderful performance and Rock the World!
